answers.answer: Hi,The probability that your husband’s diabetes and medicines may cause vaginal rash is very low. You should consult a gynaecologist to rule out vaginal infection. Also it can be allergy to washes or cosmetics. Keeping the area clean and dry will help. Hope this helps.The answer is based on information provided. Exact advice is not possible without a proper examination and investigations. You are requested to consult your Doctor. Take care and keep us posted.

question: Can my husband's diabetic meds be released in his seman and give me a vaginal rash? We have been together 24 years but have only noticed it in the past few since he has become diabetic.
title: rash from medicine/seman
